sentence.text: Mutations in the elongation of very long chain fatty acid 4 (fatty acid elongation, saturated fatty acid) gene cause Stargardt macular dystrophy 3 (fatty acid elongation, saturated fatty acid), a rare, juvenile-onset, autosomal dominant form of macular degeneration.

entity.text: fatty acid elongation, saturated fatty acid
fatty acid elongation, saturated fatty acid

sentence.text: However, this reduction in positive regulation of cell migration-VLC-PUFA content in the all-cone retina had no negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II on morphology or function and did not accelerate retinal degeneration in the R91W;Nrl-/-;fatty acid elongation, saturated fatty acid apoptotic process.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
fatty acid elongation, saturated fatty acid
